{{Location Intro|description=<p>{{If Self|Chioriya Boutique|It|Chioriya Boutique}} is a fashion label managed by [[Chiori]], a designer from [[Inazuma]].</p>}}

After starting {{Quest|Stained Spots}}, the interior can be accessed. Completing ''[[The Woven and the Cut]]'' will add a new sign to the boutique, which was put up by [[Kirara]] and [[Navia]].<ref>{{Ref/Quest|page=The Woven and the Cut}}</ref>

==NPCs==
* [[Eloffe]] &mdash; Staff
* [[Graciette]]
* [[Trudaine]]
* [[Laetitia]] (inside)

==Interactables==
===Letters on the Table===
Some letters sent to Chiori can be interacted with on the table near the front door.
{{Dialogue Start}}
;(Interact with the letter from [[Emilie]])
:'''Letter from Emilie:''' ...Thank you Ms. Chiori, for your feedback on the fragrances. I've placed a sample of my newest product in this letter. It's a recent experiment with a Romaritime fragrance.
:'''Letter from Emilie:''' Also, about the schedule for the next test...
{{Dialogue End}}
{{Dialogue Start}}
;(Interact with the letter from [[Navia]])
:'''Letter from Navia:''' It's a [[Spina di Rosula|Spina]] party this evening, and you're invited!
:'''Letter from Navia:''' P.S.: Rope Eloffe in as well, would you?
{{Dialogue End}}
{{Dialogue Start}}
;(Interact with the letter from [[Kirara]])
:'''Letter from Kirara:''' Someone asked about my clothes and where I got them while I was on a delivery run, Chiori. They said they wanted a set for their daughter.
:'''Letter from Kirara:''' I've attached the kid's sizes and a photo. I'll drop by your store to pick it up next time I'm in town!
{{Dialogue End}}
{{Dialogue Start}}
;(Interact with the letter from [[Chevreuse]])
:'''Letter from Chevreuse:''' ...The [[Garde]]s suspect the judge... clandestine illicit deal.
:'''Letter from Chevreuse:''' ...His wife... a regular customer at your store. Please keep a eye out.
{{Dialogue End}}

=== Notes on the Table ===
Unsent letters and notes can be found on Chiori's work desk.
{{Dialogue Start}}
;(Interact with travel plans)
:'''Travel Plans:''' I've heard there's a new clothing trend in [[Natlan]]. Will check it out when I have some time.
:'''Travel Plans:''' [[Snezhnaya]]n designs can be used as reference for winter wear... if it's on the way...
{{Dialogue End}}
{{Dialogue Start}}
;(Interact with the letter to Chevreuse)
:'''Letter to Chevreuse:''' [[Maison Gardiennage]]... employee... speaking in the store of a deal between their superior and... tone was conclusive...
:'''Letter to Chevreuse:''' Someone... witnessed a wanted criminal... coming and going. I fear that is just a rumor...
{{Dialogue End}}
{{Dialogue Start}}
;(Interact with the letter to [[Charlotte]])
:'''Letter to Charlotte:''' ...Thanks for your recent report. Here are the new decorations for Monsieur Verite.
:'''Letter to Charlotte:''' ...Let's have some tea when you get the chance. Tea only, by the way. No interviews.
{{Dialogue End}}
